anim_blocks.anim_code: addLayer({start_beat}s, 5s, {{ addLayer(0s, 2.5s, {{ addDrawing(0s, 2.5s, animLoadingBar(5s, {color_0}, #000000)); addDrawing(0s, 2.5s, animLoadingBar(-5s, #000000, {color_0})); }}); addLayer(0s, 5s, {{ addDrawing(0s, 5s, animFill(Infinity, {color_0})); filDrawing(0s, 5s, animLoadingBar(-5s, #000000, {color_0})); filDrawing(0s, 5s, animLoadingBar(5s, {color_0}, #000000)); }}); }}).modifyTimeChange(1s, {time_modifier}s);

addLayer({start_beat}s, 6s, {{ addDrawing(0s, 1.5s, animPlasmaShot(1.5s, {color_0}, 3%)); addDrawing(0s, 2s, animPlasmaShot(2s, {color_1}, 3%)); addDrawing(0s, 2.5s, animPlasmaShot(2.5s, {color_2}, 3%)); addDrawing(0s, 3s, animPlasmaShot(3s, {color_0}, 3%)); addDrawing(0s, 3.5s, animPlasmaShot(3.5s, {color_0}, 3%)); addDrawing(0s, 4s, animPlasmaShot(4s, {color_1}, 3%)); addDrawing(0s, 4.5s, animPlasmaShot(4.5s, {color_2}, 3%)); addDrawing(0s, 5s, animPlasmaShot(5s, {color_0}, 3%)); addDrawing(0s, 5.6s, animPlasmaShot(5.5s, {color_1}, 3%)); addDrawing(0s, 6s, animPlasmaShot(6s, {color_2}, 3%)); }}).modifyTimeChange(1s, {time_modifier}s);
